segments.text: It's forming a significant, widening puddle across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman's foot is completely submerged in it, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This wet floor is a serious hazard; someone could easily slip and fall.

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's completely focused on the cookie jar, oblivious to his own unstable perch.

segments.text: His sister, too, seems unaware of the danger, only thinking of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of the wet floor and the unstable stool is a nightmare waiting to happen.

segments.text: I can almost hear the splash and crash if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me anxious just watching him stretch so far.
segments.speaker: PAR
